story:
This is about your life. And the lives of others.

It’s about all of our lives – the ones that are constantly bombarded and interrupted and influenced by our phones with everyday stuff like texts, emails, Facebook updates, and photos and….

All these things distract us from our world -- from the things that are going on around us, and from the other people all around.

Unfortunately and all too often, lives are destroyed because of these distractions coming from our phones. Especially when driving. Taking your eyes off the road for 5 seconds to read a text is the equivalent of driving the length of a football field blindfolded. More than 3,000 people each year are killed by distracted driving.

But with Groove, we can be free of that danger. With simple actions backed by advanced technology, we can take control back. We can create a driving environment that is good for our lives, and good for the lives of our friends, our family, our community and our world. 

Katasi Groove is a gadget that lets us stop things like texts, emails, and social media from reaching our phones when we are behind the wheel – while still allowing us to rock out to our music and use navigation. We can control what we want to do and what we don’t want to do when driving.

With Groove, we empower ourselves to live beyond our phones. We are focused. Aware. Present to our surroundings and the people that surround us. We become better drivers, but more importantly, we become better humans. 

What Can Katasi's Groove Do?

Groove is a little box, smaller than a pack of cards, which plugs into a socket underneath your steering wheel that you probably didn’t even know you had.  Plug it in, send a one-time text message on your phone to the number provided, and you're done. Within seconds of turning your car on, incoming and outgoing distractions are limited by your phone provider. Turn your car off, and full function returns to your phone.

How Does It Do That?  It’s crazy simple; your car is driven by only a few family members, or maybe just you. Register the phones of the drivers in your family to the car, and Groove sorts out the rest. When a drive starts, Groove quickly determines which of these phones are in the car, and which family member is driving. It alerts your Carrier within seconds and they limit distraction to and from your phone. That's the Groove magic.  Distractions are limited by your mobile phone Carrier before they reach the phone.  When you stop your car, full function is returned within seconds and any stored messages are delivered.

You always have the ability to use your phone in an emergency.

911 calls or texts are never blocked and even the Groove system can be easily overridden if need be.

"But what about distractions, like Snapchat,  iMessage, or email?"

That’s part of the magic. Groove Carrier partners disable data-based distractions while allowing capabilities such as music streaming and navigation. Disable web browsing, but allow Pandora? Sure. Enable Maps, but disable Snapchat? You got it.

The best part about Groove is that it Just Works. It is the distracted driving solution that actually stops distractions before they ever reach your phone. This means that there is nothing to download, nothing to manage, nothing to update and nothing to worry about.

Turn your car on, and we'll turn the distractions off. It's as easy as that.

But Wait! There’s More!

Groove also comes with a game that lets drivers earn points and rewards for good driving. With a simple opt-in, the Groove technology will start keeping track of your driving mastery.  Every 5 miles of focused driving (no phone distractions, swerving or jamming on the brakes) earns you a Gruve,  an acknowledgement of 5 miles of   driving perfection.  

Each Gruve gets you points, and streaks of Gruves add to your multiplier and points really start rolling in. Stay focused, though; any lapse in safe driving will knock your multiplier down to zero.

The points you earn can be exchanged for awesome rewards like free food, discounts on gas, or even big items like concert tickets!

What Are We Asking You to Do?

This is more than a product. It’s a mission. An ever-evolving movement to get us all to be more safe, more aware and more engaged. We are almost there and need your help for the last mile.  Katasi has been developing Groove in partnership with two of the four Carriers, and are poised to launch Groove with our chosen Anchor Carrier next year.  That's the great news.

But that's not enough.  It's not just protecting you from distractions when you drive, it should also be protecting the driver of that car coming at you at 70 mph that could cross the center line.  This is why we need every Carrier on board.    

Groove lets the Carrier know when someone is driving so your Carrier can limit what distracts you while you drive.  We call this Net-Switching, and it is a connection between Groove and your Carrier that enables your Carrier to block distractions and hold onto your messages until the drive is over. Net-Switching also allows Groove to sort cellular data and enable or disable certain apps according to your wishes.

Net-Switching isn't Rocket Science.  It is a matter of making connections between Groove and already existing switches in the Carrier networks, to react to the Groove alert that someone is driving. But it does require investment and a good reason to make the investment.  We believe that saving thousands of lives is worthy of that investment.

story:
Help a new product to generate funds for Cancer Prevention Research. Help cancer patients. 

Cancer patients, families, and organizations who would like to use these products as fund raising tool are welcome to inquire.
How it All Began  
Last year, my childhood friend and best friend to this day, Theresa, who lives in the Philippines was suddenly diagnosed with a rare and aggressive type of breast cancer.  Stage 2 Triple Negative. 

From a simple medical inquiry through email, Dr. Denis Fitzgerald, a very kind oncologist in Little Silver, New Jersey offered to give her the rounds of chemotherapy she needed at an affordable out of pocket cost.  Waiving all his professional fees and possibly other medical costs involved.  The indirect introduction between doctor and patient who were thousands of miles away from each other was made possible through another long time friend of Theresa's,         Dr. Grace Ponce who was herself a cancer patient of Dr. Fitzgerald. She happened to have an appointment for a check up on the day that Theresa was undergoing mastectomy in the Philippines.  Having lived through the devastating effects of the disease herself, Dr. Ponce made a "side consultation" about Theresa's case to Dr. Fitzgerald. 

When cancer strikes, suddenly everything happens so fast. Yet, in many cases like this one, lay the beautiful weaving in the hidden tapestry of a Divine plan.                   
I volunteered to live in NJ temporarily to be her full time caregiver for the duration of the chemo treatment. Every single staff at the hospital was very kind and generous with their time and attention from the first day we arrived even though they knew that my friend is not a resident of the US. As if they were all given a heads up and had been briefed days before we arrived.  It felt as though they already knew us beforehand. Dr. Ponce took some time off from her busy schedule to accompany us on the first day.

Theresa went back home to the Philippines after completing the five months treatment regimen. It's been a year now since her cancer journey. She is doing very well - a cancer survivor.  Likewise, Dr. Ponce is a cancer survivor for over five years now. In good health, they both recently celebrated their 50th birthday. 

I personally witnessed what individual humankindness, like that of Dr. Denis Fitzgerald's and Dr. Grace Ponce's can do to save a life from across the globe.  Even more so powerful is the ripple effect it created among everyone who selflessly gave of themselves in different ways.  This was evident among all the staff at the Hematology Oncology of Central New Jersey, as well as among friends who constantly checked on us, provided some of our material needs, or travelled from other states to visit us. With both of us being strangers to the city and away from our respective homes at the time, the regular outpouring of emails and phone calls helped make our journey a lot less lonely.

My direct experience with all the loving kindness from this journey inspired me that I can also help the fight against cancer, as well as help other cancer patients. Can you please help also? 

A little about me

I am a chemist with 20 years of experience in various scientific and medical fields in the United States, including biotechnology. I am conversant with FDA regulations and  have directly interacted with FDA auditors. I am well versed in Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP). I have had leadership responsibilities overseeing day-to-day departmental operations and work assignments of other chemists in my previous line of work. 

My profile can be viewed at https://www.linkedin.com/

How the New Products came to be

In my most stressful work life situation in the past, I developed a severe upper back pain. One day while I was at home alone, lying down almost in tears because of the pain, I had a flashback of some of the natural remedies my grandfather used to make for us for various minor ailments when I was a child. As soon as I started feeling some relief from my back pain, I began formulating my chemistry-based version of natural remedies.

I distributed them to all my family members for free. Almost immediately, each one of them was requesting for more and were all giving very positive feedback. They were asking why I didn't share the product with them sooner. And to my surprise they were giving feedback for different minor ailments, more than I had purposely intend to make it for. So I started charging them for their reorders even though at the time, the containers did not have any label at all. I used ziplock bags to put the jar in and a typewritten insert of the product information. All my repeat customers didn't mind. They only wanted more of the product. Unbeknownst to me, they were sharing them with their own circles of friends and started taking orders from those people as well.  Little by little, I was able to use professionally pre-printed labels which I designed myself in order to cut cost from the hourly rate of the graphic artist. It's very satisfying for me to see how its packaging evolved from how it was then to what it is now.  I owe much gratitude to the members of my fortunately big family and circle of friends who were more than willing to try these products at their newly birthed form some years ago. Their generosity in giving constructive feedback and sensible inquiries as consumers are an integral part of the development process . All their unsolicited individual effort to proudly evangelize these products to others will not be forgotten.  And still others have also helped in great many ways.

Delivering products that I personally made using only fine ingredients and high quality standards, with the happy customers in mind, is very rewarding. I continued to take orders but only when I had free time to make another batch at a time because I was still doing other things that I also enjoyed. The greatest satisfaction for me was whenever someone shared his story of relief after using the product. 

With your financial and other support to help use these products to generate profits for cancer prevention research as well as help cancer patients, I'm sure that the intrinsic rewards we can all gain from taking action will be deeply meaningful. Priceless!


Sample Testimonial:

“I had an annoying pain one day on the back of my neck which has been a recurrent condition. My co-worker offered me to try this new topical cream that her cousin made. In less than five minutes my pain was so surprisingly gone. I was so amazed. Immediately, I ordered 20 jars and I couldn’t wait to share it with my big famiIy who experience all kinds of pain from time to time. I love it!”  -- Marian from California


What is Needed & What You Get

I need help for funding the following :
  • To commercially launch a new product and  line of personal products that will  continuously generate profits partly but focally dedicated to Cancer Prevention Research and helping cancer patients.
  • 10% of net funds raised from this campaign will be immediately donated to a Cancer Prevention Research program.
  • Business expenses for launch and to scale production of new products.
  • Product manufacturing, shipping and handling, promotional expenses involved with this campaign.
  • PayPal and Indiegogo fees, and taxes involved with this campaign.
  • Try these new products and decide for yourself its usefulness.
  • Your generosity and support to this campaign could multiply in incalculable ways to help many. 

The Impact: Help a product, Help a Cause

We need to create more and more collaborative ways to help generate funds for Cancer Prevention Research so that one day, cancer will no longer be a part of anyone's life, because it doesn't have to be.

  • With your generous support, you will be helping many, and we will be helping one another to not only fight, but also prevent Cancer.
  • You will be an important part of launching and introducing a useful new product to the wider public consumers geared for a critical social cause.
  • Cancer Prevention Research programs need all the creative ways we can help them to save lives of millions of children, adults, and elderly all around the world.
  • No effort is too small to have a long and far reaching effect with the power of  people working together and serving those who are in need.                                                                                                                                                                 "Only a life lived in service to others is a life      worthwhile"    -- Albert Einstein

Risks & Challenges
  • Gaining your belief and trust that this campaign is true to its goal and 

    commitment of donating a percentage of the profits from on-going product sales to Cancer Prevention Research and helping cancer patients.

  • Gaining your support to this campaign, financially and in many other ways, We can strive to reach our goal but we can only succeed with as much help, and with as many of you would be willing to give your financial support and different forms of help.

  • Establishing  wide consumer trust in welcoming and patronizing these new products.
  • Please be patient and forgiving that this campaign is inadequate in social media presence. Your help in this area is very much welcomed and needed

Other Ways You Can Help

Your financial support will be of immeasurable value, and so are the many other ways you can help with your valuable time and talents.

You can certainly help spread the word and create a buzz to promote this campaign. Help us by encouraging your online community groups to actually support this campaign financially and in other ways.

Please help us reach people who are change agents and change makers. 

Please share this campaign to your family members, friends, colleagues, organizations and everyone who can help us make this new product a profit generating tool for raising more funds for cancer prevention research and helping cancer patients.  

A heartfelt thank you and a lifelong gratitude to all of you.


It is possible that someday the world will be "Cancer Free".  I highly recommend reading Dr. Margaret I. Cuomo's book, A WORLD WITHOUT CANCER. A wealth of information about cancer. What we can do and how we can help fight and prevent cancer.
story_txt:
Help a new product to generate funds for Cancer Prevention Research. Help cancer patients. 


Cancer patients, families, and organizations who would like to use these products as fund raising tool are welcome to inquire.

How it All Began  
Last year, my childhood friend and best friend to this day, Theresa, who lives in the Philippines was suddenly diagnosed with a rare and aggressive type of breast cancer.  Stage 2 Triple Negative. From a simple medical inquiry through email, Dr. Denis Fitzgerald, a very kind oncologist in Little Silver, New Jersey offered to give her the rounds of chemotherapy she needed at an affordable out of pocket cost.  Waiving all his professional fees and possibly other medical costs involved.  The indirect introduction between doctor and patient who were thousands of miles away from each other was made possible through another long time friend of Theresa's,         Dr. Grace Ponce who was herself a cancer patient of Dr. Fitzgerald. She happened to have an appointment for a check up on the day that Theresa was undergoing mastectomy in the Philippines.  Having lived through the devastating effects of the disease herself, Dr. Ponce made a "side consultation" about Theresa's case to Dr. Fitzgerald. 
When cancer strikes, suddenly everything happens so fast. Yet, in many cases like this one, lay the beautiful weaving in the hidden tapestry of a Divine plan.                   I volunteered to live in NJ temporarily to be her full time caregiver for the duration of the chemo treatment. Every single staff at the hospital was very kind and generous with their time and attention from the first day we arrived even though they knew that my friend is not a resident of the US. As if they were all given a heads up and had been briefed days before we arrived.  It felt as though they already knew us beforehand. Dr. Ponce took some time off from her busy schedule to accompany us on the first day.Theresa went back home to the Philippines after completing the five months treatment regimen. It's been a year now since her cancer journey. She is doing very well - a cancer survivor.  Likewise, Dr. Ponce is a cancer survivor for over five years now. In good health, they both recently celebrated their 50th birthday. 
I personally witnessed what individual humankindness, like that of Dr. Denis Fitzgerald's and Dr. Grace Ponce's can do to save a life from across the globe.  Even more so powerful is the ripple effect it created among everyone who selflessly gave of themselves in different ways.  This was evident among all the staff at the Hematology Oncology of Central New Jersey, as well as among friends who constantly checked on us, provided some of our material needs, or travelled from other states to visit us. With both of us being strangers to the city and away from our respective homes at the time, the regular outpouring of emails and phone calls helped make our journey a lot less lonely.

My direct experience with all the loving kindness from this journey inspired me that I can also help the fight against cancer, as well as help other cancer patients. Can you please help also? 

A little about me
I am a chemist with 20 years of experience in various scientific and medical fields in the United States, including biotechnology. I am conversant with FDA regulations and  have directly interacted with FDA auditors. I am well versed in Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP). I have had leadership responsibilities overseeing day-to-day departmental operations and work assignments of other chemists in my previous line of work. 
My profile can be viewed at https://www.linkedin.com/
How the New Products came to beIn my most stressful work life situation in the past, I developed a severe upper back pain. One day while I was at home alone, lying down almost in tears because of the pain, I had a flashback of some of the natural remedies my grandfather used to make for us for various minor ailments when I was a child. As soon as I started feeling some relief from my back pain, I began formulating my chemistry-based version of natural remedies.I distributed them to all my family members for free. Almost immediately, each one of them was requesting for more and were all giving very positive feedback. They were asking why I didn't share the product with them sooner. And to my surprise they were giving feedback for different minor ailments, more than I had purposely intend to make it for. So I started charging them for their reorders even though at the time, the containers did not have any label at all. I used ziplock bags to put the jar in and a typewritten insert of the product information. All my repeat customers didn't mind. They only wanted more of the product. Unbeknownst to me, they were sharing them with their own circles of friends and started taking orders from those people as well.  Little by little, I was able to use professionally pre-printed labels which I designed myself in order to cut cost from the hourly rate of the graphic artist. It's very satisfying for me to see how its packaging evolved from how it was then to what it is now.  I owe much gratitude to the members of my fortunately big family and circle of friends who were more than willing to try these products at their newly birthed form some years ago. Their generosity in giving constructive feedback and sensible inquiries as consumers are an integral part of the development process . All their unsolicited individual effort to proudly evangelize these products to others will not be forgotten.  And still others have also helped in great many ways.Delivering products that I personally made using only fine ingredients and high quality standards, with the happy customers in mind, is very rewarding. I continued to take orders but only when I had free time to make another batch at a time because I was still doing other things that I also enjoyed. The greatest satisfaction for me was whenever someone shared his story of relief after using the product.  With your financial and other support to help use these products to generate profits for cancer prevention research as well as help cancer patients, I'm sure that the intrinsic rewards we can all gain from taking action will be deeply meaningful. Priceless!

Sample Testimonial:

“I had an annoying
pain one day on the back of my neck which has been a recurrent condition. My co-worker offered me to try this new topical cream that her cousin made. In less than five minutes my pain was so surprisingly gone. I
was so amazed. Immediately, I ordered 20 jars and I couldn’t wait to share it with my
big famiIy who experience all kinds of pain from time to time. I love it!”  -- Marian from California

What is Needed & What You Get


I need help for funding the following :


To commercially launch a new product and  line of personal products that will  continuously generate profits partly but focally dedicated to Cancer Prevention Research and helping cancer patients.

10% of net funds raised from this campaign will be immediately donated to a Cancer Prevention Research program.
Business expenses for launch and to scale production of new products. 

Product manufacturing, shipping and handling, promotional expenses involved with this campaign.

PayPal and Indiegogo fees, and taxes involved with this campaign. Try these new products and decide for yourself its usefulness. 

Your generosity and support to this campaign could multiply in incalculable ways to help many. 



  The Impact: Help a product, Help a Cause
We need to create more and more collaborative ways to help generate 
funds for Cancer Prevention Research so that one day, cancer will no longer be a 
part of anyone's life, because it doesn't have to be. 
With your generous support, you will be helping many, and we will be helping one another to not only fight, but also prevent Cancer. 

You will be an important part of launching and introducing a useful new product to the wider public consumers geared for a critical social cause. 

Cancer Prevention Research programs need all the creative ways we can help them to save lives of millions of children, adults, and elderly all around the world. 

No effort is too small to have a long and far reaching effect  with the power of  people working together and serving those who are in need.                                                                                                                                                                 "Only a life lived in service to others is a life      worthwhile"    -- Albert Einstein





Risks & Challenges

 

Gaining your belief and trust that this campaign is true to its goal and  

commitment of donating a percentage of the profits from
on-going product sales to Cancer Prevention Research and helping cancer
patients.

Gaining your support to this campaign, financially and in many other ways, We can strive to reach our goal but we can only succeed with as much help, and with as many of you would be willing to give your financial support and different forms of help.
Establishing  wide consumer trust in welcoming and patronizing these new products.




Please be patient and forgiving that this campaign is inadequate in social media presence. Your help in this area is very much welcomed and needed
 

  Other Ways You Can Help Your financial support will be of immeasurable value, and so are the many other ways you can help with your valuable time and talents.
You can certainly help spread the word and create a buzz to promote this campaign. Help us by encouraging your online community groups to actually support this campaign financially and in other ways.
Please help us reach people who are change agents and change makers. 
Please share this campaign to your family members, friends, colleagues, organizations and everyone who can help us make this new product a 
profit generating tool for raising more funds for cancer prevention research and 
helping cancer patients.  


A heartfelt thank
you and a lifelong gratitude to all of you.
It is possible that someday the world will be "Cancer Free".  I highly recommend reading Dr. Margaret I. Cuomo's book, A WORLD WITHOUT CANCER. A wealth of information about cancer. What we can do and how we can help fight and prevent cancer.

story:
The safe and fun way to get rid of weeds!

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust.

The steel constructed Weed Zinger requires no bending, kneeling, or lifting. Using this eco-friendly tool allows your yard to be chemical free and your hands to stay clean.  The Weed Zinger grabs the weed and its roots from all types of soil, even heavy clay without damaging the surrounding turf or ground cover! Simply aim and ZING the weed at the target some 3-6 feet away.  

The Weed Zinger is the only weeding tool that shoots the weed directly into a trash can without the need to bend over to pick-up the extracted weeds. 

Simply step...twist and zing the weed away.



The Weed Zinger lawn and garden tool was invented by David Weaver who wanted to make weeding easier to use.  What he discovered when outside weeding was that it was a magnet for kids and was actually fun to use.  He showed a video to me and the company was born!

What we found was that when the prototype arrived in the mail, I walked outside and my kids followed me… I was like the pied piper.  The kids then proceeded to beg me to use it!   Little did I know that what was easy for adults was actually FUN and a game for kids! 

These are our initial prototypes:

We originally put the spring on the outside of the device.  When we got the prototype from the manufacturer, we realized there were quality control issues. 

So, we moved the spring inside the device.

Here is the full picture of this version.

Then, we changed the color and made the handle more user friendly. 

We then added a handle grip and made the trigger easier to use for both left and right handed individuals.

This is the version we presented at the 2014 National Hardware Show in Las Vegas.


When we tried the various prototypes, we just couldn’t help ourselves.  We used it for hours and hours and even had to go to other houses to find more weeds!


We worked with an industrial/graphic artist who devised a way to turn the chore of weeding into a game.  He developed this backstop for kids to use while weeding. 

We also had a consumer market research study done.  They found: 

Based on the research,here is what it will look like in stores:


1.  Where we are

We introduced the Weed Zinger at the Las Vegas National Hardware Show in May.  The tool was extremely well received and we are looking forward to taking this tool to market. 


2.  What we need --- WE NEED YOUR HELP!!!

We have secured a manufacturer and they have been hard at work on a new prototype.  We need your help in funding this project so we can move forward with manufacturing.  

The costs involved are:

a.   Creating the moulds,

b.   Tooling,

c.   Building pre-production units,

d.   Load testing, legal fees,

e.   Marketing, and

f.   Distribution.


3.  We recently found a better quality manufacturer and now have our new prototype!  Meet our new prototype:


Ta-da!  Here is the new and improved version (the color will change back to the lime green for the final version).  It is about 20% lighter, has a stronger spring (and thus propels the weeds farther), and a better cushioned handle.

4.  Where we're going

Our marketing strategy post Indiegogo leans more towards working on wholesale marketing, direct response television and distribution partners we met at the National Hardware Show. We also have hired a National e-commerce manager who is working with catalog and web vendors to increase visibility of the product.  

5.  Risks and Challenges

We have reduced a lot of the risk associated with this project by successfully producing multiple prototypes with several manufacturers. We have working steel prototypes. After project completion, the manufacturing time will be 30 to 60 days and the shipping will take one to two weeks.

We are anticipating to have all tools shipped and delivered late January to early February  2015.

The main challenge we face is making sure we build a quality product that will stand up to everyday use. We believe we have built a team of professionals to meet that challenge. We have been patient and used wisdom along the way and we will continue that approach as we move forward.

Other challenges include pricing the Weed Zinger where it is attainable for the end user and sustainable for us as a company.

A successful Indiegogo campaign will help us to bring the Weed Zinger to market as quickly as possible and rapidly put the tool in the hands of our supporters. We will jump start manufacturing of the Weed Zinger by crowdfunding the parts and labor for the first 1,000 Weed Zingers produced.

Thank you for your support in making this tool a reality!

story:
A Christmas Celebration

Each year, the Kelowna branch of the Canadian Mental Health Association, in partnership with the Mental Health Department of Interior Health Kelowna, hosts a Christmas Celebration for our program participants. 

For many, this is the only celebration they experience during this holiday season.


We Are Asking for Your Help

This December we will be providing a nutritious meal and gift to over 150 youth, adults and seniors experiencing and recovering from mental illness. We are seeking your financial support and to consider putting these individuals on your virtual christmas shopping list this year. 

With a $5 donation we will send you a Virtual Hi Five - CMHA Kelowna will be able to purchase an item like sweet potatoes, fresh cranberries, cranberry juice, butter, flour, sugar to make a nutritious meal for a youth or adult experiencing or recovering from mental illness.

With a $25 donation CMHA Kelowna will elevate you to a level of awesome Karma Kudos  and will be able to purchase a small gift to give to a youth or adult experiencing or recovering from mental illness.

With a $100 donation, CMHA Kelowna will be able to make a big step in delivering a nutritious meal and gift to those in need. As a token of our appreciation of a $100 donation we will send you a pack of ArtCards created by our participants from our Artworks Studio. Many participants of the ArtWorks Studio have overcome isolation, achieved a sense of belonging and built a stronger connection to the community


*Please note: tax receipts will be given for donations of $20 or more.


About the Organizers

CMHA Kelowna is a multi-service organization that has a mandate that spans all ages and the continuum between mental health and mental illness. We strive to promote the mental health of all and support the resilience and recovery of people experiencing mental illness through: 

• public education 
• community based research 
• influencing public policy and, 
• providing direct services and supports

story:
UPDATE: 

We ship 2-3 times per week.  When you pledge, we'll send you a link to gather your sizing and shipping information.  We'll send you an email with a tracking number and a link to access the members-only www.CoolFatBurnerGuides.com.  All backers get exclusive access!

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

 

UPDATE:   HUGE ANNOUNCEMENT -- thanks to our backers, our groundbreaking university group experiment is about to be published in the peer-reviewed "The Journal of Sports Medicine and Physical Fitness!"  This is amazing news, further proving the effectiveness of the Cool Fat Burner, and is a first ever for any crowdfunding campaign!

Thanks for all your support!

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

 

The Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster are the world's first and only proven brown fat, calorie burning cooling vests.  The Cool Fat Burner allows you to burn hundreds of calories an hour while you sit and lounge.

This means you can burn as many calories JUST FROM WEARING THE VEST, as you would from working out.

The first and only calorie-burning cooling vest to show TRIPLE CALORIE BURN:

A man of my size would burn ~ 500 calories in 2 hours during this experiment.  (This experiment was conducted at the University of CA, San Diego.  They do not endorse the use of any product or protocol for cold induced calorie burning; results may vary.)  Please read and understand the Disclaimer at the bottom before pledging and using.

First conceived in 2010, the Cool Fat Burner was initially made by hand in my mom's basement.  We've gone on to become the world's leading weight loss cooling vest, the only one backed up by scientific testing and real-user testimonials, making one breakthrough and discovery after another, and we now need your help to take the next big step...
 

 


Goal:  $10,000.  Experiment 1:  Conduct the first ever university group study on the Cool Fat Burner and it's effects on calorie burning along with testing "Before & After" of other important health markers and physiological functions. 

Stretch Goal:  $80-110,00.  Experiment 2:  First ever university group study on the Cool Fat Burner and its effects on weight loss and muscle and strength gains, on college-aged men over a 6 to 8 week period.
 

Rewards:  The Cool Fat Burner, the Cool Gut Buster, our unique cold packs, and fingerless knit gloves.

 

 

The Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster are specialized cooling vests that cover "brown fat" zones on the body, and are designed to burn massive amounts of calories.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It's the same reason how:

 

  • Michael Phelps can eat thousands of extra calories a day, and stay ripped.(the water is cooler than his body temperature, it pulls the heat out, so he burns more calories to maintain body temp)
  • And how climbers of Mt Everest can lose up to 1/3 of their body-weight in a single day, despite eating sticks of butter!
  • Scientists in Antarctica and soldiers stationed in Siberia are required to eat 6000 to 8000 calories a day, just to maintain their body-weight.
  • And why Dr Oz had an audience member stand in a cold shower.  (she didn’t like it!)


The Cool Fat Burner is the only cooling vest shown able to activate calorie-burning brown fat:


And the only cooling vest to show that being cold-adapted raises your resting metabolism -- this means you burn more calories at rest, even on days you don't even wear the Cool Fat Burner!




You can wear the Cool Fat Burner at different intensities -- Beginner, Moderate, and Hardcore.  Other cooling vests can only function at Beginner intensity, where no real calorie burning occurs -- the Cool Fat Burner can go all the way to 'Hardcore' intensity, where massive calories are burned!

 

 

 


 

 

Please read and understand the Disclaimer at the bottom before pledging and using.
No, and there are several reasons why.

 

 

1.  First, "Fingers, toes, ears, & nose."  Socks, gloves, and a hat are your friends during cold thermogenesis sessions.

 

 

 

2.  Second, the Cool Fat Burner allows you freedom to do what you want, so you keep your mind on what you're doing.  Lounge around the house, watch TV, play video games.

 

3.  Cold adaptation.  As you become more cold-adapted, you'll actually feel normal in what used to feel like cold temps. 

(When cold adapted, this doesn't even cause goosebumps)

 

 

 

 

Goal:  Experiment 1 -- $12,000 - university group study on the Cool Fat Burner's ability to burn calories and effect various other physiological markers

  • Subjects will give a "Before" blood sample to test for various health markers
  • Subjects will sit at a desk and have their metabolism measured for 15 min  (this will show their baseline energy expenditure – how many calories they burn, just by sitting)
  • The subjects will put on the Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster, drink several glasses of water, and be tested with indirect calorimetry (calorie burning) for 20 minutes
  • The subjects will again drink several glasses of water, and be tested with indirect calorimetry (calorie burning) for the final 20 minutes
  • Subjects will remove the cooling vests and have the "After" blood drawn, to test for differences in the various health markers

 

Stretch Goal:  Experiment 2 -- $80,000 to 100,000 - university group study on the Cool Fat Burner's ability to induce fat burning and muscle and strength gains in 12 to 20 college-aged men, over a 6 to 8 week period

  • Subjects will wear the Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster for 1.5 hrs a day, 6 days a week, for 6 weeks.  "Before & After" DEXA scans (for fat and muscle composition) as well as physical tests (for strength and endurance) will be tested and recorded

 

 

I’ve been experimenting with controlled cold exposure for over twenty years.

I’ve always loved things that put me “in the moment.”  Athletics, martial arts, meditation, and cold exposure.  And because I loved to lose myself in those activities, I could perform at peak potential and get the best results.

I first started taking cold showers in high school.  I loved how you had to “let go” of yourself and be completely in the moment so as to go past the sensation of cold.  Later I started competing in “No Holds Barred” fighting, what is now called “MMA.”  During this period I started doing outside waterfall meditations, again for the serene, clear state of mind, as well as post-workout recovery.

 


I eventually retired from fighting, traveled the country, stopped healthy living.  And got fat.  And then in 2010 I saw this picture:

 

 


I had a family history of heart disease and early death.  I knew I had to do SOMETHING.  I heard about people taking ice baths to burn calories… but I was older and wiser now and knew I’d never stick to ice baths or cold showers.  So I jumped online to look for a cooling vest that could do the trick.  Nothing existed, and my first reaction was frustration.  THEN IT HIT ME:  I would make the cooling vest that in that moment I wanted but didn’t exist, and offer it to others with the same goal!

 

 

Testing, experimenting, R & D.  My brother and I made the packs in our basement, and I made the first 600 vests myself!  Slowly, the word spread, and people heard about the Cool Fat Burner.

 

 

 

I reinvested every single penny.  We put our reputation on the line, going to an independent, 3rd party university lab, filming the whole thing, and did the original indirect calorimetry experiment that showed the Cool Fat Burner could triple a person’s metabolism. 

 

 

 

 

No one else was doing any of this; we were out there making scientific breakthroughs.  We were the first and only to show you could easily burn 500 calories in a few hours wearing the Cool Fat Burner.   Then it started to snowball.  Experiment after experiment, success after success…

 

 

  • The Cool Fat Burner was the first. 
  • A lifelong passion for health, fitness, meditation, maximum performance and top-notch results. 
  • I've experimented with cold exposure for decades.
  • I started making the Cool Fat Burner by hand, in my mom’s basement, because nothing else like it existed. (If it had already existed, I would have happily bought it!)  It’s creation was natural and organic, and a labor of love.
  • We've proven ourselves time and again by putting our reputation on the line, proving ourselves with real, verifiable, independent 3rd party experiments.
  • Top-notch customer service & the very best in cold thermogenesis knowledge, advice, and breakthroughs.  (see upcoming CoolFatBurnerGuides.com)
  • Original research, experiments, and discoveries.  We've led the way in cold thermogenesis. 
  • Our testimonials are all of real users. 
  • We have professional athletes, fighters, bodybuilders, fitness competitors, and all around champions who wear the Cool Fat Burner.  Our customers are smart, informed winners who demand results.


Everything we do is backed up by real science.  Independent 3rd party experiments, controlled, recorded, and shared for all to see. 

 

 

 

 

 

 


The University of CA San Diego tested the Cool Fat Burner against other newcomer vests who claimed to do what only the Cool Fat Burner was already shown to do -- triple metabolism and burn hundreds of calories an hour.

Once again we BLEW AWAY the competition!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


(This experiment was conducted at the University of CA, San Diego.  They do not endorse the use of any product or protocol for cold induced calorie burning; results may vary.)

 

 

 

 

World class athletes use the Cool Fat Burner to passively burn "junk" calories w/o wearing down their bodies.

 

The Cool Fat Burner is helpful for combat athletes with weight classes.

 

Isaac is a world-class athlete, fitness adviser, and biomedical engineer. He uses the Cool Fat Burner to help passively burn calories as well as help achieve a deeper sleep.

 

 

Brian is a former power-lifting champion.  He used the Cool Fat Burner for exercise recovery.
Kevin & Katie used the Cool Fat Burner (Kevin also used the Gut Buster) to lose a total of 15lbs in one month, without dieting or exercise! 
Junior is a life-long combat athlete who used the Cool Fat Burner to speed up calorie burning and recover from workouts.

 

 

 

Karl is a lifelong lifter.  He used the Cool Fat Burner for exercise recovery. 
Jane uses the Cool Fat Burner to help burn extra calories while she works on the computer. 
John H. has experienced fast calorie burning with the Cool Gut Buster.

 

 

 


Please read and understand the Disclaimer at the bottom before pledging and using.

 

 

All backers get free access to CoolFatBurnerGuides.com (you get your login info when your perk ships)

Each Cool Fat Burner & Cool Gut Buster comes with 4 packs by default.  Some perks offer extra sets of packs. 

You will choose vest sizes and pack types when we send you a questionnaire, goes a day or so after your pledge.

(All Perks are shipped 2-3 times a week... we'll send out a sizing survey questionnaire when you order, to gather your sizing information)

 

 

 

 

FEATURED PERK --1 Cool Fat Burner, 1 Cool Gut Buster, and 1 extra set of packs  -- get total coverage for the best in cold thermogenesis

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1 Cool Fat Burner, comes w/ 4 packs. You can choose Hybrid or Soft.

 

 

 

 

 

1 Cool Gut Buster. Makes reaching 'Hardcore' level of cold thermogenesis quicker and easier.  Med to X-Lg can all hold more than the default 4 packs.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

1 Cool Fat Burner, 1 extra set of packs (you can choose either Hybrid or Soft on both)  

 

 

 

1 Cool Gut Buster, 1 extra set of packs (recommended, since Gut Busters can hold more than the 4 default packs)  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please visit out site FAQ here.
You can read the Disclaimer at the bottom of any page on the official website.

 

What is the difference between the Cool Fat Burner & Cool Gut Buster?

 

The Cool Fat Burner covers the brown fat zones and makes contact with a number of major vessels. The Cool Gut Buster covers the stomach and love handles, can hold more packs, and makes inducing cold thermogenesis easier.

One of the big tricks to going into 'Hardcore' intensity is guzzling down ice water throughout your session. Many people can go all the way into all-out shivering just by wearing the CFB and drinking lots of cold water. But what if you want to do an evening session? If you drink that much water, you may have to get up to use the bathroom, disrupting sleep.

That's why it's helpful to simultaneously wear the Cool Gut Buster; it makes it a lot easier to get cooled down, induce cold thermogenesis and burn lots of calories w/o drinking so much ice water. And the CGB can also replicate the conditions necessary to "freeze away" stomach fat, though not officially endorsed or recommended for that use.

 

What is the difference between Soft and Hybrid packs? 

Please SEE HERE for information about Hybrid vs Soft packs.

 

Can I wear the Cool Fat Burner during exercise?

 

 

In theory you could. And it might speed up calorie burning, depending on the exercise involved. Having said that, exercise itself will generate heat which will defeat the purpose of cold thermogenesis.

Even when I do cold-weather walks wearing the cooling vests, I make sure to walk slow and casually, so as to not generate heat via the exercise, but instead via cold adaptation.

 

Why is international shipping so high?

 

Each unit -- a Cool Fat Burner, Cool Gut Buster, or set of packs -- weighs ~ 6-7lbs. A combo deal (all three) will weigh nearly 20lbs. That's why international shipping rates are so steep.

Please keep in mind, it's actually MORE than what you pay; we take on some of the cost ourselves, usually around ~ 20%.

 

Where do we choose the sizes, packs types, and so on?

 

 

When the campaign ends, you will receive a questionnaire asking about what sizes and pack types you want.

Here is the sizing chart off the main site, to give you an idea:

 

 

Cool Fat Burner Sizing (Chest Size)

  • Small 30-35"
  • Medium 36-42"
  • Large 43-48"
  • X-Large 49-54"
  • XX-Large 55-60"

 

 

Cool Gut Buster Sizing (Waistline)

  • Small 26-29"
  • Medium 30-36"
  • Large 36-42"
  • X-Large 42-48"

 

 

 

DISCLAIMER -- please read, understand, and agree

 

 

 

  • Do not wear the Cool Fat Burner or Cool Gut Buster against bare skin — wear clothing underneath!
  • Darker complexioned users are more prone to cryoburn and sub dermal bruising that may leave long-lasting discoloration.
  • Consult with your physician before use.  Do not use for more than 25-30 minutes unless authorized by your physician.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • The Cool Fat Burner is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
  • Extreme cold, especially from the Hybrid packs, may cause fat cell apoptosis, and spot reduce fat. Women should consider this when using Hybrid packs near the chest area.  (layers of clothing should negate this)
  • Extreme cold near the skin for extended periods of time can cause cryoburn or even frostbite.  Cold exposure for long periods of time can lead to hypothermia. Use common sense. Seek medical help if you experience any symptoms or health problems.  Discontinue use if experiencing burning and tingling.
  • Do not place gel pack directly on the skin, use gel packs only in “Cool Fat Burner” and “Cool Gut Buster” fabric vests.
  • If you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication, or have a history of heart conditions consult with a physician before using this product.
  • Those with diabetes should not use this product without their physician’s consent.  Not recommended for those with high blood pressure, heart disease, or cardio-pulmonary problems.  Do not use if you have hypersensitivity and allergic reactions to cold or have rheumatoid arthritis with cold sensitivity, any medical conditions related to cold exposure, or have skin sensation problems.
  • Caution is necessary when applying cold on or near superficial nerves.
  • Do not sleep or lay in a reclining posture when wearing the Cool Fat Burner or Cool Gut Buster.
  • Do not use gel packs if punctured; liquid material is biodegradable, dispose of appropriately.
  • The Cool Fat Burner will not have or assume any financial responsibility or liability for medical expenses for any injury resulting from the use of this product.
  • Condensation and wetness can form on the Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster cooling vests… be considerate of clothing, furniture, etc. and moisture contact.
  • Results will vary. Age, gender, diet, physical activity level, hormone profile, etc., can all factor in weight-loss and thermal loading cold thermogenesis effectiveness.

 

 

Get Your Project Funded Today!
story_txt:
UPDATE: 
We ship 2-3 times per week.  When you pledge, we'll send you a link to gather your sizing and shipping information.  We'll send you an email with a tracking number and a link to access the members-only www.CoolFatBurnerGuides.com.  All backers get exclusive access!
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------
 
UPDATE:   HUGE ANNOUNCEMENT -- thanks to our backers, our groundbreaking university group experiment is about to be published in the peer-reviewed "The Journal of Sports Medicine and Physical Fitness!"  This is amazing news, further proving the effectiveness of the Cool Fat Burner, and is a first ever for any crowdfunding campaign!
Thanks for all your support!
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------
 
The Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster are the world's first and only proven brown fat, calorie burning cooling vests.  The Cool Fat Burner allows you to burn hundreds of calories an hour while you sit and lounge. 
This means you can burn as many calories JUST FROM WEARING THE VEST, as you would from working out.The first and only calorie-burning cooling vest to show TRIPLE CALORIE BURN:A man of my size would burn ~ 500 calories in 2 hours during this experiment.  (This experiment was conducted at the University of CA, San Diego.  They do not endorse the use of any product or protocol for cold induced calorie burning; results may vary.)  Please read and understand the Disclaimer  at the bottom before pledging and using.First conceived in 2010, the Cool Fat Burner was initially made by hand in my mom's basement.  We've gone on to become the world's leading weight loss cooling vest, the only one backed up by scientific testing and real-user testimonials, making one breakthrough and discovery after another, and we now need your help to take the next big step...  

Goal:  $10,000.  Experiment 1:  Conduct the first ever university group study on the Cool Fat Burner and it's effects on calorie burning along with testing "Before & After" of other important health markers and physiological functions. Stretch Goal:  $80-110,00.  Experiment 2:  First ever university group study on the Cool Fat Burner and its effects on weight loss and muscle and strength gains, on college-aged men over a 6 to 8 week period. Rewards:  The Cool Fat Burner, the Cool Gut Buster, our unique cold packs, and fingerless knit gloves.
 
 

The Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster are specialized cooling vests that cover "brown fat" zones on the body, and are designed to burn massive amounts of calories.
 
  

 
 
 

(Both the Cool Fat Burner & Cool Gut Buster are patent pending.) 
(PET scan of Eric's "brown fat" being activated from 1 hour wearing the Cool Fat Burner) 
 
 (Sizing chart at very bottom in the FAQ)     
Watch where I burned OVER 2500 CALORIES IN 1 DAY -- as much as running a marathon -- with the Cool Fat Burner and general cold thermogenesis, all verified by university DEXA scans and indirect calorimetry!    It's the same reason how: 
Michael Phelps can eat thousands of extra calories a day, and stay ripped.(the water is cooler than his body temperature, it pulls the heat out, so he burns more calories to maintain body temp)
And how climbers of Mt Everest can lose up to 1/3 of their body-weight in a single day, despite eating sticks of butter!
Scientists in Antarctica and soldiers stationed in Siberia are required to eat 6000 to 8000 calories a day, just to maintain their body-weight.
And why Dr Oz had an audience member stand in a cold shower.  (she didn’t like it!)
The Cool Fat Burner is the only cooling vest shown able to activate calorie-burning brown fat:And the only cooling vest to show that being cold-adapted raises your resting metabolism -- this means you burn more calories at rest, even on days you don't even wear the Cool Fat Burner!You can wear the Cool Fat Burner at different intensities -- Beginner, Moderate, and Hardcore.  Other cooling vests can only function at Beginner intensity, where no real calorie burning occurs -- the Cool Fat Burner can go all the way to 'Hardcore' intensity, where massive calories are burned!     The 3 levels of cold thermogenesis. Only the higher intensities can induce significant calorie burning.How do you control or change intensity levels?  
more or less clothing
room temp
posture
drink ice water during your session
wear both the Cool Fat Burner & Cool Gut Buster simultaneously
increase your cold-adaptation
Please read and understand the Disclaimer at the bottom before pledging and using.No, and there are several reasons why.  1.  First, "Fingers, toes, ears, & nose."  Socks, gloves, and a hat are your friends during cold thermogenesis sessions.   2.  Second, the Cool Fat Burner allows you freedom to do what you want, so you keep your mind on what you're doing.  Lounge around the house, watch TV, play video games. 3.  Cold adaptation.  As you become more cold-adapted, you'll actually feel normal in what used to feel like cold temps. (When cold adapted, this doesn't even cause goosebumps)    Goal:  Experiment 1 -- $12,000 - university group study on the Cool Fat Burner's ability to burn calories and effect various other physiological markers
Subjects will give a "Before" blood sample to test for various health markers
Subjects will sit at a desk and have their metabolism measured for 15 min  (this will show their baseline energy expenditure – how many calories they burn, just by sitting)
The subjects will put on the Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster, drink several glasses of water, and be tested with indirect calorimetry (calorie burning) for 20 minutes
The subjects will again drink several glasses of water, and be tested with indirect calorimetry (calorie burning) for the final 20 minutes
Subjects will remove the cooling vests and have the "After" blood drawn, to test for differences in the various health markers
 Stretch Goal:  Experiment 2 -- $80,000 to 100,000 - university group study on the Cool Fat Burner's ability to induce fat burning and muscle and strength gains in 12 to 20 college-aged men, over a 6 to 8 week periodSubjects will wear the Cool Fat Burner and Cool Gut Buster for 1.5 hrs a day, 6 days a week, for 6 weeks.  "Before & After" DEXA scans (for fat and muscle composition) as well as physical tests (for strength and endurance) will be tested and recorded  I’ve been experimenting with controlled cold exposure for over twenty years.I’ve always loved things that put me “in the moment.”  Athletics, martial arts, meditation, and cold exposure.  And because I loved to lose myself in those activities, I could perform at peak potential and get the best results.I first started taking cold showers in high school.  I loved how you had to “let go” of yourself and be completely in the moment so as to go past the sensation of cold.  Later I started competing in “No Holds Barred” fighting, what is now called “MMA.”  During this period I started doing outside waterfall meditations, again for the serene, clear state of mind, as well as post-workout recovery. I eventually retired from fighting, traveled the country, stopped healthy living.  And got fat.  And then in 2010 I saw this picture:  I had a family history of heart disease and early death.  I knew I had to do SOMETHING.  I heard about people taking ice baths to burn calories… but I was older and wiser now and knew I’d never stick to ice baths or cold showers.  So I jumped online to look for a cooling vest that could do the trick.  Nothing existed, and my first reaction was frustration.  THEN IT HIT ME:  I would make the cooling vest that in that moment I wanted but didn’t exist, and offer it to others with the same goal!  Testing, experimenting, R & D.  My brother and I made the packs in our basement, and I made the first 600 vests myself!  Slowly, the word spread, and people heard about the Cool Fat Burner.   I reinvested every single penny.  We put our reputation on the line, going to an independent, 3rd party university lab, filming the whole thing, and did the original indirect calorimetry experiment that showed the Cool Fat Burner could triple a person’s metabolism.     No one else was doing any of this; we were out there making scientific breakthroughs.  We were the first and only to show you could easily burn 500 calories in a few hours wearing the Cool Fat Burner.   Then it started to snowball.  Experiment after experiment, success after success…  
The Cool Fat Burner was the first. 
A lifelong passion for health, fitness, meditation, maximum performance and top-notch results. 
I've experimented with cold exposure for decades.
I started making the Cool Fat Burner by hand, in my mom’s basement, because nothing else like it existed. (If it had already existed, I would have happily bought it!)  It’s creation was natural and organic, and a labor of love.
We've proven ourselves time and again by putting our reputation on the line, proving ourselves with real, verifiable, independent 3rd party experiments.
Top-notch customer service & the very best in cold thermogenesis knowledge, advice, and breakthroughs.  (see upcoming CoolFatBurnerGuides.com)

story:
Introducing World's First Shock Resistant Clay Bottle Providing Naturally Alkaline Cool Water

THE TRUTH ABOUT NATURAL ALKALINE WATER VS ARTIFICIAL ALKALINE WATER 

What is pH?

pH stands for the ‘power or potential’ of hydrogen. It is a dimensionless figure that represents the theoretical ratio of free H+ (hydrogen cations) and thus OH- (hydroxide anions). More H+ we have an acid and more OH- we have a base. The scale runs 0 to 14 and a pH of 7 is considered neutral, under 7 acid, and over 7 alkaline. pH is a logarithmic scale i.e. pH level of 9 is ten times more alkaline than a pH of 8 or a hundred times more alkaline than a pH of 7.

Pure Water has a pH of 7 & our blood is tightly regulated at around pH of 7.4. There are essential, life sustaining chemical reactions happening in our blood continuously, and they can only happen in a narrow range of pH levels. Maintaining the right pH level is so important to our survival that if it drops below 7.35 or rises above 7.75, the body deploys numerous buffering mechanisms—involving blood proteins, phosphate, bicarbonate, and the lungs and kidneys—in order restore the balance. Anything that overwhelmed those buffering mechanisms and made the blood either too acidic (below 7) or too alkaline (above 7.7) would be fatal.

PoogDy’s Clay bottle is sourced right from the womb of Mother Nature – The best way to drink naturally alkaline water.

The internal clay structure is made out of Terracotta & Healing clays like Bentonite in appropriate proportions. What makes Bentonite clay “Healing Clay” is the way it is formed –it is basically composites of volcano ash formed when volcanoes spew molten earth from the planet’s core. Bentonite clay possesses detoxifying properties due to its unusual molecular structure. It is unique due to its ability to produce a strong “negative electrical charge”. 

FEATURES :

Shock Resistant: The bottle is one of a kind triple walled bottle where the clay structure is surrounded with shock absorbent material & covered with steel. The Bottle is designed to absorb accidental falls thus preventing the internal clay structure from breakage. 

Internal Clay Structure: Clay pot made with terracotta & healing clays like Bentonite in appropriate quantity which offers abundant health benefits

External Steel Covering: Clay is porous in nature & thus to support its natural process of evaporation, the external steel structure has more than 200 micro holes which provide enough amount of natural breathing. The quantum of the holes are enough for maintaining the water cool within and thus enjoy all the benefits of any regular breakable clay bottle. These micro holes in no way shall compromise the sturdiness of the bottle.

Magnetic Lid with adequate spout shall help you sip the perfect quantity without hindrance.

Wide mouth cap designed for easy filling & for easy cleaning.

Use for water or selected beverages: The bottle is perfect to carry water and can also be used for hot/ cold beverages like coffee, tea & milk. 

Where-ever you go: The bottle is absolutely convenient to carry along be it your Car, as it fits in any Standard Car Cup Holder. It can accompany you at your gym, office or for a hike, perhaps any place you can think of. 

Moist free: The bottle is designed in such as way that the internal Hot beverage shall not have effect on the exterior steel body, hence it is convenient to hold hot or cold beverage alike. Besides the bottle is moist free too at the same time, hence keeping any cold beverage shall not have any moist effect on the exterior body of the bottle.

CLEANING CARE 

Fill the bottle with warm to hot water and squeeze in few lemon drops, leave it for 15-20 mins and use a soft pad/bristles brush (non-metallic) to remove any stains or to clean the walls of internal clay.

It is not Dishwasher safe, avoid using soap or abrasive powders as they may clog in the walls of the Clay. 

The bottle can be cleaned once in two days if only used for storing water.

COLOR OPTIONS

Milky White

Matt Black

Project Evolution- Pictures & Showreel

Risk and Challenges:

PoogDy LLC comprises of experienced entrepreneurs who have immense manufacturing experience and have a team in place for all critical areas of business like Production, Quality, Logistics, and Packaging. 

We have done our homework, so perils are minimal. We have identified and locked in our manufacturers who will be able to ship within 60 days of successful project funding.

You can be rest assured, the final product will be more elegant with superior finesse, as compared to the prototype seen in the video. In particular, we are developing the best version of the clay structure.

Sometimes when bringing a new product to life you come across certain unforeseen circumstances and for these occasions we do add buffer time, but sometimes that aint enough. If there is any delay we will apprise you on the subject and team PoogDy is committed to get through it together and deliver high quality product.

Thank you for your support! We are deeply grateful that you're on this journey with us! In case you have any questions, please feel free to e-mail us at support@poogdy.com

The quantum of the holes are enough for maintaining the water cool within and thus enjoy all the benefits of any regular breakable clay bottle. These micro holes in no way shall compromise the sturdiness of the bottle.Magnetic Lid with adequate spout shall help you sip the perfect quantity without hindrance.Wide mouth cap designed for easy filling & for easy cleaning.Use for water or selected beverages: The bottle is perfect to carry water and can also be used for hot/ cold beverages like coffee, tea & milk. Where-ever you go: The bottle is absolutely convenient to carry along be it your Car, as it fits in any Standard Car Cup Holder. It can accompany you at your gym, office or for a hike, perhaps any place you can think of. Moist free: The bottle is designed in such as way that the internal Hot beverage shall not have effect on the exterior steel body, hence it is convenient to hold hot or cold beverage alike. Besides the bottle is moist free too at the same time, hence keeping any cold beverage shall not have any moist effect on the exterior body of the bottle.CLEANING CARE Fill the bottle with warm to hot water and squeeze in few lemon drops, leave it for 15-20 mins and use a soft pad/bristles brush (non-metallic) to remove any stains or to clean the walls of internal clay.It is not Dishwasher safe, avoid using soap or abrasive powders as they may clog in the walls of the Clay. The bottle can be cleaned once in two days if only used for storing water.COLOR OPTIONSMilky WhiteMatt BlackProject Evolution- Pictures & ShowreelRisk and Challenges:PoogDy LLC comprises of experienced entrepreneurs who have immense manufacturing experience and have a team in place for all critical areas of business like Production, Quality, Logistics, and Packaging. We have done our homework, so perils are minimal. We have identified and locked in our manufacturers who will be able to ship within 60 days of successful project funding.You can be rest assured, the final product will be more elegant with superior finesse, as compared to the prototype seen in the video. In particular, we are developing the best version of the clay structure.Sometimes when bringing a new product to life you come across certain unforeseen circumstances and for these occasions we do add buffer time, but sometimes that aint enough. If there is any delay we will apprise you on the subject and team PoogDy is committed to get through it together and deliver high quality product.Thank you for your support! We are deeply grateful that you're on this journey with us! In case you have any questions, please feel free to e-mail us at support@poogdy.com

story:
Eliminate Airborne Pollutants...

With today's exposure to airborne viruses, its important for employers to protect their employees while driving commercial vehicles or working indoors in confined office spaces.  Mindful With Care understands your concern and has worked hard to develop an environmental friendly solution that not only protect employees, but clients as well!

 

The 7-in-1 Commercial Air Purifier was developed to protect our workers and clients

  • Hired Transportation, Taxi Service, and Personal Family Vehicles
  • Public Transportation, Fire, Police, and EMS Emergency Vehicles
  • Fast Food Delivery, Supply Chain, and Carrier Delivery Vehicles
  • Public Utility,  Local Government, and Federal Issued Vehicles
  • Indoor Office Conference Space, Cubical Areas, and Cashier Stations

 

 

Our portable commercial vehicle and desk air purifier can efficiently sterilize the air in vehicles or within employee cubical work spaces within minutes, depending on the size of the vehicle's interior, office space, or home office with areas up to 100 sqft. We utilize innovative technology to filtrate, sanitize, sterilize, and purify the air surrounding the space around you. Review our video below for a demonstration of its effectiveness.

 

 

Sterilize the Air in Just Minutes

Our specially designed wind wheel moves contaminated air pollutants through the 7-Stage filtration system with minimal noise. The speed of air flow is not important, what is important is the effectiveness of the unit's killing power to stop and inactivate the pollutants. From multiple layers of medical grade filtration to UV sterilization, our product will trap the pollutant. Fresh air is then released with negative ions mixed with fragrant aromas to capture new pollutants in the air. With negative ion saturation, the air borne particles will cluster and flow toward the intake of the air purifier, starting the process of elimination all over again. The unit comes with a 1-year warranty with our US-based company, Mindful With Care.

  • 12 Cubic Feet per Minute Airflow 
  • UVC Strength 254nm Wavelength for Germicidal Killing Power
  • Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) rating is 700 cubic square feet per hour
  • Removes 95.5% of atmospheric particulate matter (PM) of less than 2.5 micrometers
  • Vehicle DC12V Cord requiring only 6 Watts of Power to Operate
  • 120VAC Adapter allows for Indoor Office or Home Use

As an eco-friendly industrial, medical-grade product, the unit only needs 6 watts of power supplied by a DC12V cigarette lighter power cord provided. For office or home use, simply attach the 120VAC wall plug adapter power cord, provided as well; two uses for the price of one! 

Product Size: 8" x 5" x 3.3" weighing only 1.1lbs allows the unit to lightly rest on the dashboard with rubber non-slip feet or strap the unit to the back of the headrest with provided straps.  The unit is made of black ABS durable plastic utilizing a 7-Layer Filtration System that stops and/or kills 99.5% of the microbial's in the air up-to 0.3 microns.

 

 

The filter life expectancy is 4-6 months, depending on the surrounding area of use where constant air contamination is present. No tools are needed to remove and replace the filter set from underneath the access door. Filter sets are available for purchase at our website online store, www.mindfulwithcare.com, for $15 per filter set. The unit is built with an intelligent mode circuit that shuts off the unit after (4) hours for energy efficiency while extending the life of the filter. No worries, a 4-door sedan will take 2 minutes to sterilize while a SUV will take 5 minutes.
 


How it Works

The 7-in-1 Commercial Air Purifier deploys advanced technology to sterilize the air in the space we find ourselves in daily. As an industrial strength air purifier, usually priced above $200 USD, this unit contains the most scientific proven methods possible in one unit to stop microbial pollutants such as virus proteins, bacterial spores, mold, allergens and pollen's at an affordable price. Each filtration component must do its job on an industrial level to conform to certified standards expected by the Medical Industry.1st Filter - Pre-filtration shell utilizes paper materials to effectively remove large particles from entering further.

 

2nd Filter -HEPA 13 medical-grade stops tiny particles hosting virus proteins, bacterial mold, dust, allergens, or smoke at 0.3 microns or greater with 99.5% accuracy. 

 

3rd Filter - Activated carbon filter absorbs odor, organic or inorganic chemicals in the air.

 

4th Filter - Photo-catalyst filter helps to remove formaldehyde, ammonia, benzene, TVOC, hydrogen sulfide, and other harmful gases from the air.

 

5th Filter - UV-C Sterilization light illumination in an air chamber in the unit per 254nm wavelength is deployed to help inactivate any remaining viruses while killing molds and bacteria at 0.1 microns or greater in size that reach the penetrating light beam, causing the nucleic acid and proteins to break up as the main cause of death.

 

6th Filter - Negative Ion (electrons) are released into the air like air cleansing bubbles at a low-frequency voltage of DC4KV, forming 2,000,000 ions per cm3 to create a biocidal attraction of host-virus proteins to each other, forming clusters that get lodged into the filtration process instead of passing through at sizes below 0.3 microns.

 

7th filter - Aromatherapy oils can be applied to a cotton ball under the access door to allow fresh air smell to flow through the air space in the vehicle or in your immediate office space. This fresh aroma will give your clients, passengers, or co-workers a sense of environmental health and wellness when around your presence. Let's help protect the ones we appreciate and cherish!

 

We believe there is a difference in outcomes between air purifiers that utilize a 3-in-1 filtration system and our air purifier that deploys a 7-in-1 filtration system with ionic and aromatherapy processes.

 

Mindful with Care shares your concern regarding your health and wellness in a working or leisure environment. Allow us to provide your customers, staff, and yourself with durable, industrial capacity products that exceed the expectations of medical professionals without the high cost of simpler systems.

 

Thank you for considering our product! 

 

Other indoor and commercial family products with larger capacities can be reviewed on our website, Mindful With Care: https://www.mindfulwithcare.com/

story:
My name is Gail Gunther.  My son Dylan is currently volunteering in La Prusia, Nicaragua for Casas de la Esperanza.  Dylan has limited access to internet and phone, so he has asked me to work on his behalf.  Included is the letter he sent me to post for him:

"I’m spending my summer in the small village of La Prusia, Nicaragua, building houses for Casas de Esperanza. There’s a young man here named Hector who’s in great need of help. He’s fifteen, a paraplegic, and confined to a wheelchair. Life in this part of Nicaragua is very difficult, and for Hector, it’s nearly impossible—so much, in fact, he’s spoken about ending his life. The wheelchair he has now is in complete disrepair and barely functions. As a result, he’s always in tremendous physical and mental pain. Hector is in dire need of a new wheelchair.

         Anything you can donate, no matter how small or large, will make all the difference in Hector's life. Wheelchairs adequate for the rough terrain of La Prusia are in the $2,500 range. If you have any questions about Hector, the community of La Prusia, or Casas de la Esperanza (www.casas-de-la-esperanza.org), you can reach me on facebook or email at dylangunther@aol.com. Thank you so much for listening and caring. I strongly believe that your help will give Hector a renewed sense of life."

 

Muchas gracias!!

 

Sincerely,

Gail and Dylan Gunther

story:
Hi! My name is Camille and I was diagnosed with Lupus Sep, 2009. I am taking my health into my own hands by starting this journey toward holistic healing through 200 hour yoga training 

Lupus is not an illness that many people know about and yet it affects 1.5 million of the U.S population and 5 million worldwide. 

Lupus is a variable disease, allowing the affects to permanent patients differently, making yoga a near perfect intervention since the practice can be individualized for the array of symptoms each person is dealing with. 

Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE) is a chronic autoimmune illness in which the body attacks itself. It’s similar to rheumatoid arthritis, except that the inflammation of SLE can affect not only the joints but almost every other bodily system, including the skin, heart, lungs, and kidneys.

It is considered a progressive illness, meaning it gradually worsens over time, and it alternates between periods of remission and flare-ups.

Usually caused by: 

Stress

Over-exertion

Catching an infection,cold, foreign bacteria

All resulting to swelling of the joints causing severe pain, depression, fatigue and anxiety.Developing a steady yoga practice can go a long way in making a difficult illness more manageable.

 This immersive yoga teacher training will empower me to face my illness and ultimately inspire others on the power of healing.  

Through personal experience I was able to witness first hand what yoga can do to my body. I was able to stop my medication for about 4 months when I practiced yoga everyday and juicing.   

A regular yoga practice can also help the mind observe itself during the stress of pain and physical limitations

Benefits:

Stress management 

Improve physical energy

Pain management 

Improve flexibility and mobility 

Improve mood and coping

I want to be an advocate for lupus awareness to educate and empower others as well as myself that with the right diet, lifestyle change and the practice of yoga we can all heal! The approach to a holistic healthy lifestyle starts from within. "Be the change that you wish to see in the world" - Mahatma Gandhi

Appreciate your time and efforts. This opportunity would change my life; please help any contribution can't make the difference .

story:
A small donation can go a long ways. This fund will only be open for 10 days- trying to raise $500 (or more) in a short period of time. If you feel inclined to give, please do so...now.

In October, Hurricane Sandy not only impacted the East Coast, but also battered the island of Haiti causing further devastation since the 2010 earthquake.  Nearly 400 acres of farmland were wiped out and many are now homeless and suffering from lack of food. My church (Cornerstone SF) has partnered with the Foundation for Peace and is helping to provide food and resources to this community. Cornerstone is also participating in the construction of schools to provide vital education for the children in this poor community. Please support Haiti and this cause by joining me in the spirit of giving this season. Thank you.
